segments.text: Look at me . I look so old ! I look as if I were thirty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on ! Stop being so vain . You look great ! You are beautiful !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am , but I think it ’ s time for some plastic surgery I ’ m tired of these wrinkles and sagging skin . See ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t see any wrinkles or sagging skin ! You are stop beings ridiculous . Besides , I think that people who get Boto , have facelifts , or tummy tucks look weird.It doesn ’ t look natural .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Whatever , I think I ’ m gonna get liposuction and a nose job and some breast implants as well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you need to get brain surgery . I honestly don ’ t think you need cosmetic surgery.You look amazing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought you were my friend and would support me on this ! I just want to feel better about myself and feel more attractive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You don ’ t need plastic surgery to do that . You are fine the way you are and you have guys drooling all over you ! Plus , plastic surgery hurts !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah ! When I got my nose job I was black and blue for a week !
segments.speaker: S1
